gw.cc.claim.entity

Interface ClaimContactRole


  • public interface ClaimContactRole
    ClaimContactRole Join table linking claimcontacts with their roles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets the Contact associated with this ClaimContactRole.

    • Method Detail

      • remove

        void remove()
        Removes this bean from its bundle. Before it does this, it checks its ClaimContact. If this is the ClaimContact's last role, the ClaimContact is removed as well.

      • removeRoleOnly

        void removeRoleOnly()
        Removes this role from its bundle without also removing the associated ClaimContact even if this is the last role. Normally you should use remove(), which will remove the associated ClaimContact if this is the last role.

        For example, this is used on the claim parties page, so the user can temporarily remove all roles without having the associated claim contact disappear as well. That lets the user remove an incorrect role and then add the correct role without having the claim contact disappear from the screen.

      • getContact

        Contact getContact()
        Gets the Contact associated with this ClaimContactRole.

      • setContact

        void setContact(Contact contact)
        Sets the Contact for this ClaimContactRole. If the Contact already exists on the associated Claim, then its ClaimContact is used. Otherwise, a new ClaimContact is created for the Contact. If the previous ClaimContact that owned this role now has no more roles, it is removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Contact cannot be set on this ClaimContactRole because its type is not compatible with that required by the owner and role.

      • setEvaluation

        void setEvaluation(Evaluation value)
        Sets the value of the Evaluation field.

      • setExposure

        void setExposure(Exposure value)
        Sets the value of the Exposure field.

      • setMatter

        void setMatter(Matter value)
        Sets the value of the Matter field.

      • setNegotiation

        void setNegotiation(Negotiation value)
        Sets the value of the Negotiation field.

      • setPolicy

        void setPolicy(Policy value)
        Sets the value of the Policy field.

      • setIncident

        void setIncident(Incident value)
        Sets the value of the Incident field.

      • isEditableInELV

        boolean isEditableInELV()
        Determines whether this ClaimContactRole is editable in the EditableClaimContactRoles ListView. A ClaimContactRole is editable if it can be removed and the user has permission to edit its owner.

      • updateDenormalizedContacts

        void updateDenormalizedContacts()
